name: Quantum Mouse
description:
Quantum Mouse is a 3D puzzle game where you play as a genetically engineered mouse undergoing lab experiments to test the extent of the mouse's self-cloning ability. Navigate various mazes and collect your rewards using the cloning ability.

  • Move using WASD
  • Clone yourself using the space bar up to 4 times
  • All cheese wheels must be stood on by a mouse in order to progress to the next level
